components.description:
A merperson who may be referred to as merfolk or merpeople in plural. May be used for the display of a mermaid, mergirl, merwoman, or merman.

Occasional shown wielding a trident.
components.title: Merperson

title: Merperson

version.description:
Unicode 10.0 is the version of the Unicode Standard released on June 20, 2017. 8,518 new characters were included with this update, of which 56 were emoji characters.

Only new emoji code points are listed on this page. For the full 2017 emoji list; see Emoji 5.0 which included all 239 emoji additions including sequences for skin tone and gender.

apple_vendor_description: The merperson emoji on Apple devices is a fantastical creation, blending human and fish-like features with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients. Its tail shimmers with iridescent scales, catching the light realistically, while the upper body is rendered with soft, rounded contours. Whether male or female, the merperson's expression is often serene or whimsical, symbolizing the mysteries of the ocean, fantasy, or a sense of otherworldly allure.
